resources.string:
BusyBox Installer is a one-click BusyBox installation utility for various android architectures (ARM/ARM64 and x86).

©sunilpaulmathew

Credits
https://busybox.net/ - BusyBox Binaries
Grarak - A bunch of Code
SmgKhOaRn - Korean Translations
sajid_islam - App Icon
Congrats! The latest version of BusyBox (v%s) available on this app is already installed on your device!
Are you sure to install BusyBox %s?
Unfortunately, BuyBox installation from this app is not yet available for your architecture (%s)!
New update available! Do you want to update BusyBox to v%s?
Unfortunately, BusyBox installer is failed to write BusyBox applets on your device\'s \'/system/xbin\' folder!
BusyBox installation Finished! Do you want to reboot your device?
The following applets are included in this package!\n\n - %s
BusyBox installation won\'t work without Storage Write Access! Aborting
BusyBox installation won\'t work without Root Access! Aborting
BusyBox v%s is successfully removed from your device. Do you wan\'t to reboot?
Unfortunately, removing BusyBox v%s from your device failed!
Are you sure to remove BusyBox (v%s) applets from \'/system/xbin\'?\n\nPlease Note: It will only remove the applets installed by this app on your device!
BusyBox installation from this app is not detected on your device!
